Expert1.Name: Ritesh Girase
Expert1.Article: Research the company and practice common interview questions to boost your confidence.

Expert2.Name: Ritesh Girase
Expert2.Article: Use the STAR method to structure your responses to behavioral questions effectively.

Expert3.Name: Ritesh Girase
Expert3.Article: Dress appropriately and maintain good body language to convey professionalism.

Expert4.Name: Ritesh Girase
Expert4.Article: Prepare insightful questions to ask the interviewer about the role and company.

Expert5.Name: Ritesh Girase
Expert5.Article: Follow up with a thank-you email after the interview to express gratitude and interest.

Expert6.Name: Ritesh Girase
Expert6.Article: Practice mock interviews to build confidence and receive constructive feedback.
